content: I don't have personal opinions, but i can say that the miracles' music was known for its emotional resonance, alluring harmonies, and catchy beats, which were all unique and groundbreaking for their era. even though musical tastes have evolved over time, many of their songs have stood the test of time and have been covered by contemporary artists, proving their longevity and relevance. additionally, the sounds of motown and soul music that the miracles helped popularize still influence modern music today, so it's possible that their music would still resonate with audiences today.
